wikipedia_page.main: Tony McNulty (born 6 March 1957) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward, active in the Netherlands in the 1980s.

response: In an article headlined "Tony McNulty, Benefit Cheat", Alex Massie in a blog for The Spectator contrasted the statements made by McNulty regarding benefit cheats with his own claims for expenses. On 18 May 2007, McNulty was one of the 98 MPs who voted in favour of exempting parliamentarians from the application of the Freedom of Information Act 2000.
* Guardian Unlimited Politics – Ask Aristotle: Tony McNulty MP
